mapper.insert: insert into lot_orders (id, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at, order_id, floor, lot_id, car_no, status, begin_time, end_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deletedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{floor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lotId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{beginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update lot_orders set created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted_at = #{deletedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, floor = #{floor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lot_id = #{lotId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_no = #{carNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, begin_time = #{beginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at, order_id, floor, lot_id, car_no, status, begin_time, end_time from lot_orders where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at, order_id, floor, lot_id, car_no, status, begin_time, end_time from lot_orders
